about_the_game:
Hungry Monster is a free and engaging cooking game designed for parents and kids to enjoy together. Help perpetually hungry monster by preparing delicious meals using various ingredients. Chop, season, and cook to satisfy their appetites in this fun and educational adventure.

Free to Play

Enjoy all the game’s content without any in-app purchases. Play anytime, anywhere without spending a dime!

Safe for Children

Designed with simple and intuitive controls, Hungry Monster ensures a safe and enjoyable experience for children. Parents can feel confident allowing their kids to play in a secure environment. Perfect for bonding time with your little ones.

Learn Cooking Skills

Experience the joy of cooking while teaching your children essential culinary skills. Learn how to chop ingredients, season dishes, and prepare meals, all while feeding hungry monster. An entertaining way to introduce kids to the basics of cooking.

Fun Graphics and Characters

Featuring colorful and charming graphics, Hungry Monster brings adorable monster to life. Each play session offers new discoveries and smiles with lovable character that keep the game exciting and visually appealing.

Multiple Game Modes

Engage in various modes including eating challenges.

Join your child and embark on a delightful adventure to satisfy Hungry Monster! Download now for a free and enjoyable cooking experience that the whole family can cherish.

---

Key Features:

-Free to Play: Access all game features without any cost. Enjoy endless fun without worrying about in-app purchases.

- Parent-Child Friendly: Safe and secure gameplay designed for children, allowing parents to supervise and enjoy together.

- Educational Gameplay: Teach your kids basic cooking techniques in a playful and interactive environment.

- Engaging Graphics: Bright and appealing visuals that captivate both children and adults.

- Eating Game Challenges: Participate in fun eating challenges that test your speed and accuracy in feeding monsters.

Download Hungry Monster today and start your free cooking adventure with your family!

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Equivalent open-source or proprietary drivers supporting OpenGL 4.1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Nothing
  • Additional Notes: Nothing

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
